Name: Re-Roll 1s to Hit
ToolTip: Each time an attack is made, re-roll a Hit roll of 1

Name: Re-Roll to Hit
ToolTip: Each time an attack is made, you can re-roll that attack's Hit roll

Name: Re-Roll 1s to Wound
ToolTip: Each time an attack is made, re-roll a Wound roll of 1

Name: Re-Roll to Wound
ToolTip: Each time an attack is made, you can re-roll that attack's Wound roll

Name: Lethal Hits
ToolTip: Each time an attack is made, a Critical Hit automatically wounds the target

Name: Sustained Hits X
ToolTip: Each Critical Hit scores X additional hits on the target

Name: Devastating Wounds
ToolTip: Saving throws cannot be made against Critical Wounds scored by this attack

Name: Anti - X
ToolTip: An unmodified Wound roll of X+ against a target with the matching keyword scores a Critical Wound

Name: Feel No Pain X
ToolTip: Each time this model would lose a wound, roll one D6: if the result equals or exceeds X, that wound is not lost

Name: Invulnerable Save X
ToolTip: Never modified by an attack's AP

Name: Half Damage
ToolTip: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, halve the Damage characteristic of that attack

Name: Crit X
ToolTip: An unmodified Hit roll of X+ is called a Critical Hit and is always successful.
